backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing products, orders, and user profile management with access control and CRUD operations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/styles defining theme variables and light/dark color tokens using OKLCH.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router setup, routes, and root component handling profile‑setup logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking auth state and redirecting unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users for their name and saving their profile.
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogF: Sidebar filters for sorting, category selection, and price range inputs.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Clickable product card showing image, info, stock, and add‑to‑cart actions.
frontend/src/components/common/Price.tsx: Formats a numeric or bigint amount into a USD currency string and displays it in a span.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Page layout wrapper providing top navigation, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar with logo, catalog links, admin link, login button, and cart indicator.
frontend/src/components/product/Quantity: A control for adjusting numeric quantities with buttons and direct input, enforcing min/max limits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Determines authentication and admin status using the actor and Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, orders, and user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining the site's color palette and layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the App.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Displays an access denied message with navigation back to home inside the store layout.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin UI for listing products and creating, editing, and deleting them using dialog forms and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, allowing item quantity updates, removal, clearing the cart, and navigating to checkout or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays a product catalog with filtering, sorting, audience selection, and category-based browsing using mapped storefront product data.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including shipping form, order submission, error handling, and storing order data before redirecting to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows a hero banner and collection previews that link users to catalog pages filtered by audience.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Reads stored order details, displays purchased items and shipping info, and provides a link to return home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single product with audience/category metadata, allows quantity selection, and adds the product to the cart.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Zustand cart store handling add/remove/update operations, totals, and sessionStorage persistence with bigint parsing.
frontend/src/types/storefront.ts: Type definitions for storefront entities including products, cart items, filters, sorting, and shipping info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, features, and a pending request to support product updates.
